name: Tank Commando 3D
description:
Tank Commando 3D is an action/stealth FPS presented in a retro wireframe style. Sneak around, find weapons, and use them to destroy the battalion of Tanks that have invaded your city.

Features

  • A complex environment with different item layouts every time you play.
  • Intelligent opponents that will hear the sounds you make and pursue you until you're dead.
  • Fast movement and gunplay inspired by Half-Life and Metal Gear Solid.
  • Retro wireframe graphics inspired by the vector arcade games of the 1980s.
  • Really big explosions.

Created in 7 days for #7DFPS 2018.
